FuncDef: This command configures the system-wide high watermark threshold as a percentage of the per-ISA datapath core CPU utilization, where an alarm will be raised by the agent. CPU usage is the average usage across all datapath cores.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the high watermark for datapath CPU usage alarms. Values-1 to 100.
Disables the high watermark for datapath CPU usage alarms.
